english.segment1: Everywhere I go its all being taken. Pick me up a book about new sensations. Take me to a place with no frustration. Pack it up before I lose my patience
english.segment2: Here we go. Lets take them to the show. Woah woah. Come on turn on your radio. Woah woah. Lets go take them to the show. Woah woah. Come on turn up your radio
english.segment3: Call me on the phone or two way pager. Won't be coming home so see ya later. You can keep your cars and your jet black hummer. You won't see me again until next summer
english.segment4: Here we go. Lets take them to the show. Woah woah. Come on turn on your radio. Woah woah. Lets go take them to the show. Woah woah. Come on turn up your radio
english.segment5: Come on if your feeling, if your feeling alright (x12)
english.segment7: Here we go. Lets take them to the show. Woah woah. Come on turn on your radio. Woah woah. Lets go take them to the show. Woah woah. Come on turn up your radio
english.segment8: Here we go. Lets take them to the show. Woah woah. Come on turn on your radio. Woah woah. Lets go take them to the show. Woah woah. Come on turn up your radio
english.segment9: (its a party. Come on ya'll. Do you feel good. Oh oh feel good)
english.segment11: (its a party. A come on. Yeh yeh yeh yeh)
